name: Moonblast
description: You summon forth a powerful moonbeam that strikes a creature. Make a ranged attack on a target in range, dealing 2d8 + MOVE fairy damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 15 or more, the target has disadvantage on its next attack.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
